fieldDescription: Percentage of standard monthly salary that an officer is paid when suspended
Fee to suspended an officer as a multiple of their monthly salary
Number of story points it costs to demote an officer
Fraction of bonus XP granted when spending a story point to demote an officer
Fraction of bonus XP granted when officers forget elite skills
Whether to show the opposing fleet's commander's combat-related skills upon first interaction
Whether to show two skill panels, one for personal skills and another for fleet-wide skills. Has no effect if "Show Opposing Fleet Commander Skills" is disabled.
Comma-separated list of persistent custom tags for filtering officers. Leave blank (whitespace only) to use tags from officerextension_settings.json
